snippet: The nation’s march toward full equality for all took an important step forward on Election Day with victories for same-sex marriage.
abstract: Editorial applauds groundbreaking victories for same-sex marriage across country on Election Day in Maine, Maryland, Washington and Minnesota; contends nation's march toward full equality has taken important step forward.
lead_paragraph: The nation’s march toward full equality for all took an important step forward on Election Day with victories for same-sex marriage.

headline.seo: A Big Leap for Marriage Equality on Election Day
headline.main: A Big Leap for Marriage Equality
headline.print_headline: A Big Leap for Marriage Equality

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
